headline: Citigroup's Card Delinquencies Decline, Charge-Offs Increase in August
summary: C's August credit card metrics show lower delinquencies but higher charge-offs, with lending activity inching up.

headline: Citigroup’s Executive Shuffle and AI Focus Might Change The Case For Investing In Citigroup (C)
summary: Citigroup has announced a wave of executive appointments in September 2025, including new leaders for its investment banking, debt capital markets, AI, and the Singapore franchise, along with multiple fixed-income offerings. This coordinated refresh of leadership and technology expertise highlights Citigroup’s commitment to strengthening its global franchise and accelerating its digital and investment banking growth. We'll explore how the focus on senior talent and AI innovation may reshape...
